success.passwordEmailSent: A reset email has been sent to your email address.
success.smsSent: A verification code has been sent.

twoFactor.title: Two-factor authentication (2FA)
twoFactor.description: Strengthen your account security by enabling a two-factor authentication method.

backup.title: Backup codes
backup.description: One-time codes in case of loss

ipRestrictions.title: IP Restrictions
ipRestrictions.description: Limit access to your account from certain IP addresses.

password.title: Change password
password.description: A reset email will be sent to your email address.

sms.title: Add SMS number
sms.phoneDescription: Enter your phone number to receive verification codes.
sms.codeDescription: A verification code has been sent to {{phone}}.

deleteSms.title: Delete SMS number
deleteSms.description: Are you sure you want to remove this number from two-factor authentication?

totp.title: Add TOTP application
totp.generateDescription: Click "Generate" to get a QR code to scan.
totp.scanDescription: Scan this QR code with your application:

deleteTotp.title: Delete TOTP application
deleteTotp.description: Are you sure you want to remove this application from two-factor authentication?

u2f.title: Add security key
u2f.description: Click "Add" then follow your browser's instructions.

deleteU2f.title: Delete security key
deleteU2f.description: Are you sure you want to remove this security key from two-factor authentication?

backup.title: Backup codes
backup.generateDescription: Generate backup codes to keep in a safe place.
backup.saveWarning: Keep these codes in a safe place:
backup.validateLabel: Enter one of the codes to validate

disable2fa.title: Disable two-factor authentication
disable2fa.warning: Warning: this action will disable all 2FA methods.
disable2fa.codeLabel: Enter a backup code to confirm
